title: Welcome to Blaze
content: Welcome to Blaze, an evolution of Synapser! We're excited to have you on board as we embark on this new journey together. Blaze is designed to enhance your experience with improved features and a fresh interface. Stay tuned for more updates and enjoy exploring all that Blaze has to offer!

title: v1.2.0.3 Released
content: The next major overhaul update is here!

title: Project Atlas
content: Project Atlas, the v2.0.0.0 update for Blaze is coming along nicely! Still working on some major changes core implementations, but the polish phase should start real soon!
